title: Got ddosed during my ranked game
body: played a game just before getting into ranked the ping was 36 stable when i started ranked something went wrong and i had constant 150 ms which prevented me from playing and i lost 20 lp for free ...

replies.body: ill check the log but the whole thing was very suspicious played a few games w/o any problems then all of a sudden i get 150 ms out of nowhere during ranked vs suspicious enemies. at that time my net was stable. i was able to load videos and talk on skype smootly (wasnt downloading anything) ill check the logs to see what exactly caused that ms.

Sudden lag spikes are usually a result of network problems like a poor connection, and not likely what you're suggesting here.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and know for sure!  I'd recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is running smoothly and prevent this in the future.  Best of luck in your next match, you got this!
